EmailTemplate.description: Note to parents about new security in Lower Campus 2014
EmailTemplate.name: Note to LC parents about new Security
EmailTemplate.subject: New Security Guard in Lower Campus
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please be kindly informed that our new security guard started working in Lower Campus from today. His name is Rafik and you can see his photo attached to this email.
Уважаемые родители,
Данным письмом сообщаем Вам,что в здании детского сада с сегодняшнего дня приступил к работе новый охранник. Его зовут Рафик, в приложении можете увидеть его фото.
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
